item.title: Trump-Putin meeting live updates: No ceasefire announced, Trump says 'great progress'
item.description: President Trump and Russia's Vladimir Putin are holding a joint news conference after a more than 2 1/2-hour meeting in Alaska.

item.title: Thieves grab $2 million in jewelry in Seattle heist that took less than 2 minutes
item.description: Seattle police say smash-and-grab thieves have made off with an estimated $2 million in diamonds, luxury watches, gold and other items in a daring mid...

item.title: WATCH: President Trump and Russian President Putin arrive in Alaska
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Putin arrived in Alaska for their high-stakes summit about the war in Ukraine.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump and Vladimir Putin greet each other at Alaska summit
item.description: “That was a very friendly welcome,” ABC News' Chief White House correspondent Mary Bruce tells David Muir.
